law.text:
A court may:
compel compliance with an order of the Board or Commission regulations governing conflicts of interest, financial disclosure, lobbying, or ethics in public contracting by:
issuing an order to cease and desist from the violation; or
granting other injunctive relief; and
impose a fine not exceeding $5,000 for a violation of this title or Commission regulations governing conflicts of interest, financial disclosure, lobbying, or ethics in public contracting.
